text:
HI Alll :slightly_smiling_face: Just FYI:

Salesforce is depreciating API versions 21.0 through 30.0. I was checking with HubSpot support whether the HubSpot/Salesforce integration will be affected by this and I was informed that *Salesforce-HubSpot integration is not affected by this Summer '23 release changes and there is no action needed on customers end :)*
